pkgmetadata.longdescription: Various Utilities for Library Science/Assessment and Cataloging // Provides functions for validating and normalizing bibliographic codes such as ISBN, ISSN, and LCCN. Also includes functions to communicate with the WorldCat API, translate Call numbers (Library of Congress and Dewey Decimal) to their subject classifications or subclassifications, and provides various loadable data files such call number / subject crosswalks and code tables.
